English.title: ЁЯМН Envisioning a Sustainable World
English.intro: This tool guides you through a participatory visioning process inspired by Dr. Donella Meadows.
English.intro_text_2:
This tool includes two groups of questions taken verbatim from Dr. Donella Meadows' original envisioning exercise, presented at the Third Biennial Meeting of the International Society for Ecological Economics (1994, San Jos├й, Costa Rica).

The first group is for facilitators only. It includes guided instructions to help hold the space and lead the visioning activity. The second group is meant to be read aloud to participants, in the exact order presented. Facilitators should read each question slowly, leaving time for reflection and emotional connection, without rushing the process.

Swahili.intro: Zana hii inakuongoza katika mchakato wa maono ya ushirikiano uliotokana na Donella Meadows.
Swahili.intro_text_2:
